inclusion.criterion: study staff member will describe the study and offer participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient signs research protocol and HIPAA consent forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient receives a copy of the forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pregnant women undergoing primary or repeat cesarean section
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: maternal age greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: gestational age greater than or equal to 34 weeks
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of drug or alcohol abuse
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Maternal age less than 18 years of age
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 34-year-old obese woman who comes to the clinic with weight concerns. She has sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape.
